amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to repeal the subpoena authority of the Department of the Treasury's Federal Insurance Office and the Office of Financial Research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
